website_summaries.verdict: A good buy for those who want a simple, large, reliable thermos without all the bells and whistles.
pros: The twist and pour stopper makes serving simple and mess-free
Customers rave over how well this thermos keeps liquid temperatures ice cold and boiling hot
cons: Some buyers had issues with shipping
Other customers claimed the product leaks

customer_reviews.title: There's better alternatives
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do the job, and hasn't yet failed after a month of use, but it's clearly not a high quality product. Handle is loose and rattles, paint was scraping off on the first day, the lid fits funny, the insulation isn't as good as it could be. I'd recommend the equally sized Stanley. Having used both of them for the same amount of time, I think the Stanley is higher quality in every way, although the Thermos has a wider mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Adie

customer_reviews.title: How big is it?
customer_reviews.text: Do you ever buy things quickly and overlook important details like size? this thing is really big.. scare a toddler big.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermos. I drink a lot of coffee so this size really comes in handy. I fill it up at the local convenience store for $1.29, What a deal for 68oz. Gees my coffee hot all day long so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 thermos 2 liters and 1 liters. Like all the great thermos products, this thermos is also excellent. We put boiling water 20 hours ago and today the water was still boiling for coffee. Even in the small thermos of liters the boiling water remained boiling for 24 hours. No words Thermos is a reliable and excellent company and we at home love all their products. We highly recommend great products.
customer_reviews.author: Naama

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Thermos brand thermos that I purchased recently. Both lasted about a month. For no apparent reason, they just stop keeping water hot. They were not damaged. The outside gets warm, which means they are losing heat. Can't tell if it is a cap or insulation problem. This product is made in China. I spend lots of time in China and the hot water bottles there often have the same problem. My guess is that whoever now owns the Thermos brand is not doing their job concerning quality control on the factory in China that is making this for them. Won't buy this brand again. Tired of throwing money away.
customer_reviews.author: Paddy W.

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: I just did an unintentional product test. I filled my Thermos (and some other insulated containers) with boiling water on Tuesday afternoon in preparation for two nights of temperatures below -25, in case we lost power. I just emptied it now, on Friday morning, and the water in this Thermos was still uncomfortably hot to the touch! All the rest of the containers had room temperature water. I think I'll donate the others and buy a few more Thermoses!
customer_reviews.author: Astromom

customer_reviews.title: Gasket fell off almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Thermos because I had one just like it for years. When the gasket came off I thought it was supposed to be up near the top of the screw cap, but it obviously didnt belong there. When I ordered the new one I noticed the gasket was located at the bottom of the screw cap. I bought this slightly over a month ago and have had to put the gasket back on at least three times. Currently, this gasket is sitting inside my thermos somehwere under my coffee. I guess Ill need to look elswhere but its painful because Ive had Thermos brand thermos for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the water hot for a looong time!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect that it can keep the water hot for 24h. Before this one I bought a Contigo bottle I bought from Costco and that one completely made me disappointed! But this one was amazing! I bought a smaller one for one of my friends as a gift and he also likes it very much. He hikes a lot and uses the bottle almost every week. The only flaw is that it gets scratched very easy which is not a big deal for me. I recommend you to buy the steel color.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: The best Thermos I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I can't give enough praise for this product. I bought the Thermos because of it's stainless steel construction, the amount of liquid it holds, and the use of a vacuum to keep the beverage insulated. I bring filtered lemon water from home so I don't have to drink the tap water in the office, and I am impressed with how well it keeps the water cold throughout my whole shift. I add some ice to keep it extremely cold, and I find that even after 24 hours there's still a lot of ice left in the container - demonstrating how well the Thermos insulates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Warehouse Deal, Great Thermos
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Warehouse deal and saved an additional $10.00 because of a cosmetic defect. I didn't mind because I am probable going to beat the heck out of it anyway at work. Arrived supper promptly like always with only a small dent on the bottom, unnoticable unless you look for it. The dark blue is very dark and unusual with a suttle beauty for a such a utilitarian item. Couldn't be more pleased. I love shoping the Amazon warehouse deals.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: Faulty seal / defective thread - spills out.
customer_reviews.text: I barely used this thermos( twice to be exact ) and each time I poured hot tea during the road trip, the cap unsealed and spilled half of the tea in the car. The second time the entire tea came out... I noticed no matter how tight you screw in the cap, over time it gets loose and slips out of the thread. This is a one useless thermos. I had about of this brand and thought to give a try with 64oz but I regret getting one and cannot return or exchange
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great thermos
customer_reviews.text: This thermos is great for taking hot soup to work or school. It keeps hot foods hot and cold foods cold for quite a while. It’s also easy to clean. I’ve had this thermos for years and it’s still functioning. It’s extremely durable and doesn’t break even after being dropped countless times. This thermos is also really, really big so you can keep a lot in it at once. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great for semi-truck drivers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday. He loves drinking coffee all day while he's out driving, but he likes it super hot. The old thermos that he had would keep his coffee hot until he poured out the first cup. After that, the coffee went cold. With this thermos, he pours coffee throughout the day, and when he gets home, I open the top and the coffee is still so hot it's steaming! And, it's big enough to hold a lot of coffee, but not too big that it's difficult to manage in the truck. REALLY GOOD PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: Rust/stains at the bottom, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but why are there these brown, rust like stains there? Of course I washed it to see if it would come off but these stains seem permanent. Poor quality control! I emailed the manufacturer to exchange but they asked me to email another department. Too much hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Navjot K Samra

customer_reviews.title: TWO LITERS BIG
customer_reviews.text: This is a big Thermos. It will hold two liters of liquid. Big ice cubes will fit in the opening. The quality of construction is very high. It is black with a silver cup. It has a sturdy handle. After 14 hours my iced tea is still ice cold. You can pour through the lid or take the lid off and pour. Worth every penny. Does not come in a gift box. Just a regular cardboard box. Made in China. BIG ITEM. Not for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Don Fort Lauderdale

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with thermos brand
customer_reviews.text: This thermas is great. It keeps our tea or coffee warm for a while and i love how easy it is to clean. The only downside is that the paint scratches and wears off easily. My 3rd time using it, the top side paint wore in a couple areas. Besides that, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I have a 10oz vacuum insulated thermos and loved it. Got this for my parents as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10oz vacuum insulated thermos and loved it. Got this for my parents as a Christmas gift to replace their old thermos. It got great use on the 6 hour drives we do to see family occasionally, it kept the coffee hot the entire time! Really like the feature the cap has where you can unscrew it partially and then pour out the small gap that's built in for a more controlled pour. It was really helpful when pouring out coffee while on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: keeps  liquids hot or cold .confirmed
customer_reviews.text: the feature of pouring with cap on. Useless. unscrew that piece and just pour. my water stayed cold for 9 hours before i had to refill weather was cold also. Kept my coffee hott 12 hours weather was cold also. nice handle easy to carry. im keeping product. makes my life easier . hott coffee on the ready . cold water on the ready. i bought 2 . just for that.
customer_reviews.author: O.G G-MAN

customer_reviews.title: Oh, baby! Aren't you hot...
customer_reviews.text: We use it to keep hot water....well, hot - for baby bottle warming on the go. They make products specifically for this, but they either (a) don't keep the water temperature hot enough for long enough, or (b) don't maintain enough water for any considerable amount of time. This just works, and it works darn well! (Can I say damn?) I'll update if the durability proves lacking, but so far? It's good.
customer_reviews.author: ~Austin A.

customer_reviews.title: Store temperature as 24 hours or more and easy to carry!durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one i bought they are very reliable when keeping the liquid hot for several hours sometimes in one day!
customer_reviews.author: Edison Lusung

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We've had this thermos for 2 years now it is still in pristine condition it holds t for 3 days! It will be lukewarm on the third day but still it is absolutely fantastic amazing for road trips amazing to take to the movies with you I am so satisfied with it that I actually bought the smaller version for myself to take to work
customer_reviews.author: Greengiant

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: As usual...hope for the best expect the worst. Piece of Stanley crap. Hot? Cold?? Hour coffee may stay hot for the drive to work. 45 minutes?? Make it to lunch? No way!!!! Buy a 50/50 or a hydroflask. Amazing to me one of the original thermos makers can’t compete wit the new kids on the block
customer_reviews.author: Darin Carner

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after a few uses spill when pouring.
customer_reviews.text: It leaks after 3 uses. The 3rd time I filled it up amd screwed it on it started leaking... yes it was screwed on correctly... but now leaks out the screw cap amd the silver lid on top. My truck seat didnt like it., and the bigger one, all it does is spill everywhere when you try and pour it. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy dutt

customer_reviews.title: Yup, this thing is huge!!
customer_reviews.text: Saves money...I drink nearly a pot of coffee (12-cup pot) a day, usually at least 3-16oz cups from a local coffee shop at around $2 a cup. Now I make my own pot at home and bring it with me to work. It stays hot all day, doesn't leak, and oh, did I mention, I'm saving money?! Only problem I had was that the first one I received appeared used; however, returning/replacing it was easy. Thanks Amazon for making that process easy, I do wish quality checks were in place to prevent "used" items from unintentionally getting out of the warehouse in the first place though.
customer_reviews.author: Walt B.

customer_reviews.title: a BIG BIG Thermos for a BIG BIG thirst!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big. no no, I mean BIG, huge, comically large! it's 2L and I knew that when I bought it but DANG it's huge! I'm a 6' guy and holding this thing reminds me when I was 12 carrying my grandpa's thermos to him (which I suspect was filled with not coffee, but I digress). I took this on a 10 hr trip for the 2 of us and we had hot coffee all the way till the end.
customer_reviews.author: TheOriginalgiga

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, my wife and i call it big bertha. we have used it on two long road trips. First trip was from home KC to Denver Co, it is 8.5 hrs, and then on another trip today from KC to Edin OK to pickup a puppy. Roundtrip on day 649 miles 10hr. Both trips we filled it with hot coffee and both trips at the end when we opened the thermos the coffee was still hot with a little steam.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. O'neil

customer_reviews.title: Holds an entire pot of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I got this big boy because I got tired of running out of coffee in my old thermos, which was falling apart in any event. I have not been disappointed, this is well constructed and does what it says it will do. For me, the ability hold more than a full pot (12-13 cups) of coffee is the big selling point. This thing is built like a tank and keeps beverages 'drinking hot' for a good 10 - 12 hours or more. go ahead and get one, if you're a coffee drinker it's a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis Tex

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks hot, this size is easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: This worked and kept my tea very hot for a remarkably long time. It's easier to clean than smaller models due to the wider neck. I wish Thermos replicated this down their line. You will still want a long neck brush for ease of cleaning though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Diggie

customer_reviews.title: Thermos for drinks
customer_reviews.text: I like this thermos a lot. Two things make me give 4 instead of 5 stars - 1 - it can be extremely difficult to open when tightened, 2 - it is not midnight blue, it is black. Otherwise, great. Keeps my stuff hot for over 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermos, weak packaging on the part of Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great Thermos, keeps temperature really well. I use it to incubate yogurt and it is perfect for two quarts. The only reason it does not get 5 stars is the handle. In the picture it is flat against the Thermos but in reality, it does not stay that way. It stays half open at a slant, I had to use Velcro to keep it down. I was surprised that Amazon did not protect this more, usually Amazon fills the box with brown paper, The Thermos was loose in the box, no protection at all, not even a plastic bag. I guess it's a good thing Thermos' are no longer made of glass.
customer_reviews.author: jpf

customer_reviews.title: Performs well when kept indoors (shaded, dry, out of direct sunlight conditions)
customer_reviews.text: Kept most of the ice for full 3+ days indoors in dry, shaded conditions in Mojave Desert with daytime room temperatures in 70-75 F and nighttime - at 60-65 F. Kept hot coffee hot for 24 hrs and warm for 48 hrs at about 70 F daytime and 50 F nighttime temperatures. The container was indoors in very dry conditions at high altitude (Brian Head UT). The only downside for us was the.metal pieces in the handle rattle and make noise when come into contact with the container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a Thermos!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's just what I need. The screw cap pour doesn't work very well, but I just unscrew n pour, no biggy. Holds a full pot of hot tea. Had a little ding in cup, but again for 23 bucks still like new and again price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Life

customer_reviews.title: Awesome thermos!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase! Always get up well before my wife and use this to keep the coffee warm but not scorching on the burner. Will easily keep coffee at drinking temperature for over 24 hours in a climate controlled room.
customer_reviews.author: Jkdmo

customer_reviews.title: classic HUGE Thermos
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying a Thermos you know what you're getting - larger, bulkier, heavier bottle compared to all the Nalgene and Hydros out there - but guaranteed you'll have this ten years or more - good for longer camping trips and larger hauls
customer_reviews.author: schlitz

customer_reviews.title: JUMBO BIGGEST SIZE & WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is LARGE & GREAT for Cold drinks or Coffee in outdoors for bunch of people ..but i bought the same model in 24oz and 40oz for hot or cold drinks & use this JUMBO SIZE to transfer Soups or Chille for out doors like camping or so on with few of my friends,keep it piping HOT all day and we all loving & enjoying the food throw the day! GREAT products , happy with each one of my Thermos products in deferent size and shape since pass few years and these new models & LOVE this Matte blk,great looks & color!
customer_reviews.author: 80SChild

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Great huge size. Durable. Great insulation.
customer_reviews.text: The capacity is great. I measured temperature of water I put in at 195F and then measured it 24 hours later and saw 150F. Totally amazing. That is still painfully hot so it works excellent. Please note that the more water you have in there the better the heat stays due to reduced loss to the air inside (which leaves when you open the top). Be very gentle with washing it. I have a feeling it will be damaged easily by abrasives.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works nights every two weeks. He is able to make a full pot of coffee and put it in the thermos, this will last him all night! It is not super easy to clean but still great product that last him all night!
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great for iced beverages. If you allow it to precharge (hot or cold), it'll keep your stuff cold or hot much longer. I had iced water in it and the ice took over 36 hours to melt. This thermos is PERFECT for long shift work.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping hot and cold, but not a comfortable carry
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the quality of the product. I would only suggest that the handle could be a little more ergonomical and comfortable to carry for this specific size, especially when full and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Little

customer_reviews.title: The best quality of thermos I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and you will not be disappointed with your purchase. It is a little bigger than I anticipated. Not in the size of the container but in the amount or volume that it holds. It holds more than enough hot liquids for my family of three on our road trips and day trips when touring Europe. If you are looking for a bigger thermos this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Newell

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Stays Hot.
customer_reviews.text: Great Thermos...Received This And "Its Been Great Not Having To Rewarm Coffee.." I'm Impressed And It Holds A Whole Percolator + Perfect Match To The One I've Been Using For Content Size...I'm Pouring And Sipping Coffee Now Still Hot From Last Night....Very Nice...
customer_reviews.author: Earl ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing will store a whole pot of coffee and keep it HOT. Easy to clean and highly-durable. It's a one-time purchase, as I can't see this thing breaking. Glad I have it. I live by this rule: "Buy it nice, or buy it twice." I definitely have made a quality, one-time purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermos, HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands so i can fit mine in to the bottom to clean it. The boyfriend not so much. If you have large hands or forearms you’ll want a cleaning brush. Boyfriend has only had it since Christmas and used a few times. He so far loves it. I got him the stainless steel since I read reviews saying the paint chips on colored thermos’s.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Mott

customer_reviews.title: This will hurt you!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Stanley it Is a small one and I ran out of coffee quick. I used the screw on top for my cup. When my new thermos came I couldn’t wait to use it. I filled it with a fresh brewed coffee and of to work I went. I offered a cup to fellow workers then poured a cup for myself using the top provided. OUCH I BURNED MY FINGERS AND DROPPED THE CUP!!! I would have never thought it would be hot very hot. The Stanley brand was not hot at all. Is there a after market top available or do I have to always carry an extra cup. I’m not feeling the love for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Monday.

customer_reviews.title: ... enough water for my daily amount and this works perfect for that
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a container that would hold enough water for my daily amount and this works perfect for that. I just bring this to work now and don't need a bunch of bottles. It also stays cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kay L. Seibold

customer_reviews.title: I should have paid more for another Stanley.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use when I need to clean my Stanley thermal bottle, I should have bought another Stanley. (sorry Thermos) This is way lighter construction and seems "cheap" it does keep my coffee hot,but it has a wide mouth and I much prefer the smaller mouth of the Stanley. I also wish this was made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: 1973  AMCJavelin

customer_reviews.title: Great thermos!
customer_reviews.text: We bring it camping and we keep it filled to have hot water on demand. We fill it with hot water at night so when we wake up in the morning we have hot water to make coffee, tea, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Zeus Cabahug

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take with you!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE thermos products! I bought this for my husband to use while hunting and ice fishing. Perfect for hauling warm drinks or food. Keeps things hot for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Meliz3

customer_reviews.title: OMG the value
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe the price for this superior quality! My beverage stayed COLD after being in a hot 110 degrees car for over 5 hours, never did I expect that
customer_reviews.author: Luwho

customer_reviews.title: Great produce
customer_reviews.text: It's a huge thermo.My husband really like it.He can drink warm water a day outside.That's good produce,keeping warm well.I pulled hot water in yesterday,and the water keeps hot this morning.that's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: xinxin guo

customer_reviews.title: Too big!  My fault though.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize just how huge 68 ounces was. I have a 32" vacuum tumbler for my iced coffee in the morning... I just wanted to be able to fit two cups, so I figured I'd double 32 ounces .... Uhh this thing is as huge as a small tool box. Truck drivers would probably love it. As a retail manager, no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: W805

customer_reviews.title: This thing is massive.
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the biggest thermos I've ever seen. I love it. Keeps my coffee undrinkably-hot throughout an entire workday. Haven't tried cold liquids yet, but presumably it produces the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Trashcat

customer_reviews.title: almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: it does exactly what it says the only problem i have is the handle is plastic and not stainless steel had one of these before and the plastic handle broke
customer_reviews.author: VitoWolverine

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I've kept water cold for up to 2 days in a hot car with this thing! This thermos is amazing! Tested warm liquids in this thermos during a bad Canadian nor' easter and it kept the liquid hot for over a day. What beautiful sorcery is this!
customer_reviews.author: Doc W

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Sun up to sun down reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps within a few degrees of whatever you pour in for 12 hrs and even really warm after 18 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: casey ressler

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!  Just mega size!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I have used to for 3x so far, water is nicely hot for hours. It can be very "big" and heavy to travel with. I do recommend to buy, as long as you do not mind to travel with such a big thermos.
customer_reviews.author: mom_of_2

customer_reviews.title: have this product for close to 2 years and it holds the temp like a champ
customer_reviews.text: There are some minor defects: the arrow of the direction of the pour is the opposite of what it should be. Minor thing, but it gets you confused every time you pour the hot liquid. Overall, have this product for close to 2 years and it holds the temp like a champ! (Also, the plastic handle is very cheaply made and designed.)
customer_reviews.author: Tartsakov Dmitri

customer_reviews.title: Realy work.
customer_reviews.text: 24 hours will keep the tea hot if it is full. Or 12 hours if you gradually empty it. Checked in the winter in the mountains, gently, easy to bend the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim

customer_reviews.title: Great product - delivered as promised
customer_reviews.text: This is my new beach thermos. Hold 68 oz that will last all day! Delivered as promised
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Chatterton

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with its keep warm and cold ability
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with its keep warm and cold ability. One thing I wish they can improve is the handle.i know it is designed for space saving but really not comfortable when u lift the heavy full bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Richman

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how it could start to fail like some reviews said
customer_reviews.text: works all day for a week now. Don't know how it could start to fail like some reviews said, beat it on a concrete curb? Glad I went with my knowledge of how thermos at the least knows what best to do after all the trials through the years. I bought a two liter french press to fill it with. SterlingPro Double Wall Stainless Steel French Coffee Press 1.745L. Love it when a plan comes together.
customer_reviews.author: Fastner

customer_reviews.title: I love this one
customer_reviews.text: I love this one. I owned a Stanley but somehow it did not keep the heat inside anymore after 1 year of usage. Believe it or not but If you don’t open the lid, this one keeps boiled water still hot after 48 hours. Very good product. It does not sweat not gets hot outside.
customer_reviews.author: bahar

customer_reviews.title: Super Industrial Strength and Size
customer_reviews.text: Ginormous. Hot coffee with easy pour stopper as a bonus. Only distraction is clanky handle. It doesn't naturally lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Paratus

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thermos and very large capacity which is what I was looking for. It kept our hot chocolate and spiced rum hot for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Suntan21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tailgating with a crowd
customer_reviews.text: This thermos is huge. It holds a full 12-cup pot of coffee. It was too big for the purpose we purchased it for, so it was exchanged for the 40-oz.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for xmas gift fro my husband and he told me that it keeps his coffee hot for most of his 12 hour day. The size was a little big as I didnt pay attention to the oz part but this thermos will come in handy on trips will not run out of coffee with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Fishingal

customer_reviews.title: A classic that every home should have
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with these thermos. They are important not only for trips, but to store hot water and avoid reheating; and store iced water as well. I bought the Midnight blue, it is a gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mont

customer_reviews.title: It is nice however it misses a relief valve
customer_reviews.text: It is nice however it misses a relief valve. If you put hot water on it and go from a high altitude to a low altitude place you can get burnt when opening the bottle as pressure goes up as there is no bleed off/relief valve. I don't give 5 stars due to this unsafe design.
customer_reviews.author: Raf

customer_reviews.title: Super Thermo ...
customer_reviews.text: I never own a thermo the have so many complements...and no just that the way to keep my coffe is impressive...love it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Richie Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good product...... If it doesn't arrive dinged.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work and we typically have about 8 to 10 of them in rotation at a time. They usually last around two years....... But that being said the last two I ordered came in like this..... Damaged. Now I get that this is purely cosmetic and will in no way affect the functionality of the product. However that being said it sure does feel bad to pay nearly $40 for a damaged thermos.
customer_reviews.author: R. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a birthday present for my husband he's been using it for a couple months now and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: This is huge! Works as expected. I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This is huge! Works as expected. I purchased this for juicing while at work. I was fasting aside from the juice and needed something with enough volume to last all day (my thought was if i run out, I'll be tempted to eat). I kept it in the freezer at night and my juice stayed chilled all day.
customer_reviews.author: mikenphx34

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases we have ever made. My husband and I are huge coffee fans and have a hard time keeping our coffee warm. This was the perfect spot zen for two people and keeps your coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This thermos will keep your beverage hot or cold for a long time and the price is incredible. 68 ounces is huge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold warm for more than 3-4 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I have this thermos like 4 1/2 months now. I boiled the water at 10pm and at 4am it was already cold. In the first month of use it was still good. After 2 months it doesn’t keep the warm any more than 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger does mean better!!
customer_reviews.text: This thermos is huge! Great for hot chocolate, kept it warm all night.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maul

customer_reviews.title: best thermos out there!
customer_reviews.text: i have yet to find another thermos that can handle this volume without leaking and without odd materials in construction -this is a must have, i take it to work everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: perfect for taking hot water for tea to picnics or ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect for taking hot water for tea to picnics or for large outdoor family camp things. holds about 2 liters of boiling water. stayed hot for hours and hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for keeping my coffee hot overnight. Could be a little smaller though as a full pot of coffee made with my Mr. Coffee brewer did not fill the thermos to the top. It's height also makes it a little difficult to clean. However, I was pleased with its performance in keeping liquids hot.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Stark

customer_reviews.title: MIXED
customer_reviews.text: Does a fairly good job. Keeps ice in 90 degrees for 8 to 10 hours. Paint chips and metal bends easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my ice for four days at room temp. Keeps ice all day in my truck on a 100 deg day. I'm in construction and wish I had bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Nater

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad. He said he didn't really like it because he prefers a bottle with a hard handle, and this one is not, which makes it more difficult when he tries to pour water out. Also, the hole for the twist and pour stopper is too small, water comes out very slow. I don't recommend to buy this, there are so many better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: LQW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all around
customer_reviews.text: I've used it to hold water for ultimate frisbee, brought it camping, taken it to Army field exercises, it's gigantic, tough, good looking and I snagged it when it was cheaper (add to cart - price always fluctuates). I haven't tested warm liquids, but its kept icy water cold for hours in the sun. The only thing I don't like is that the edge of the mouth is sharper than convenient if you're trying to drink straight from the thermos. I've looked at the Bubba insulated bottles but those are definitely not as well threaded or have the vacuum insulation.
customer_reviews.author: JRMang

customer_reviews.title: I did not like packaging and the way it was sent
customer_reviews.text: I did not like packaging and the way it was sent. I had two thermoses ordered. They are not wrapped at all. So, they were banging on each other all the way in shipment. This one was in thin plastic bag and little one did not have any wrapping at all. It was pretty scratched up. As far as product itself - I tested it. It is holding good for more then 24 hours. So far. I don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Worked for Six months
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product so that we can keep hot water overnight or atleast more than 12hrs than it claimed 24Hrs. The product worked well for first six months and it kept water hot atleast for 12 hrs or so. But after that it only keep hot for 6-8 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: jitu

customer_reviews.title: Heat Escapes from Top Metal Opening Section. Bad Design or Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Useful Large bottle bat does not keep hot water too long because heat escapes from the top metal section.
customer_reviews.author: kenwinning

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Take it to work with right now cold water or lemon aid made inside of it and ice. Stays cold for the double shifts I generally work.
customer_reviews.author: 5cents family

customer_reviews.title: Great for tradesmen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, he works in the Carpenter's Union. This thermos provides him enough water for his entire shift and commute. It has taken quite the beating but no signs of real damage, just scratches and scuffs. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for long trips
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to have for any type of trip. Have mostly used it to keep water cold and it did not dissapoint. The carrying handle is a nice feature to have as well.
customer_reviews.author: Freshh

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The thing I didn't like was that when you understand screw the top to pour out it makes a mess not at all like the Stanley thermos. The upside was it holds some coffee and will keep it hot for more than 24 hrs and that's the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Monique cortez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Daily Work Commute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for work. Buying from my favorite coffee house can get expensive. I drink lots of decaf coffee daily and did not want the hassle of cleaning a coffee pot at work. This Thermos in Midnight is perfect. It does keep my coffee hot! The pour nozzle keeps leaks out and makes pouring coffee much easier. The handle keeps this very portable for daily travel.
customer_reviews.author: Bruindiva92

customer_reviews.title: Huge capacity, holds temp well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to mix adult beverages in to take to the beach. Held the ice the entire day in the cooler. Super huge capacity
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: coffee drinker
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product. My friend fills it in the morning and drinks it all day. it stays warm.
customer_reviews.author: Teo,Tony and Bowmin

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased some of those $100+ boutique bottles and nothing can touch this...I fill it with ice and keep it in a 75 degree room...FOUR DAYS later about half of the ice is still there...it's big, but if that's not a concern don't even hesitate...the BEST...I haven't used it for hot, but I'd expect it to outperform the others at that as well...
customer_reviews.author: David DePersis

customer_reviews.title: Thermos did a good job with this line
customer_reviews.text: The size of this thermos, it doesn't hold heat like it's smaller counterpart, but still a drinkable temp 24 hrs later. Still well worth the purchase. I'm very happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Big and effective
customer_reviews.text: Good thermos. I fill it with hot soup for lunch when I go ice fishing and it's always plenty hot when lunch time comes. Also, this thing is huge!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable, keeps liquid hot or cool for or a long time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, easy to use. I took it to Africa and it keeps my drinks cool or hot for a long time. Very stylistic, and modern looking.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Joy King

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This us worth what I spent on it. Bought a cheaper one that the lid broke as soon as it was knocked over the 1st time. Waste of money. This one feels much stronger and I plan to purchase another on soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a cross country trip to hold hot coffee. After 10+ hours on the road as well as tapping into the coffee several times the remaining coffee was still as hot as when I filled the thermos Large capacity and ez pour spout makes this the ideal thermos for a long road trip or for a day long outing such as fishing or hunting hiking etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every pennies
customer_reviews.text: I have a great selection of thermoses. This is a very top notch bottle. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: szilist

product_meta.title: Thermos Stainless King 68 Ounce Vacuum Insulated Beverage Bottle, Midnight Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Midnight BlueAn ideal choice for people on the go, the Stainless King Vacuum Insulated Beverage Bottle is built to last and loaded with features to make for a more enjoyable drinking experience. Thermos vacuum insulation technology virtually eliminates temperature change within the beverage container by creating an airless space between two stainless steel walls. The result is a superior insulated container you can depend on to keep your beverages hotter, colder, fresher, longer. This beverage bottle keeps beverages hot or cold for 24 hours, making it a great choice for wherever life's adventures may take you. Constructed with double wall stainless steel, this 2 Liter beverage bottle is virtually durable, yet its rugged design is both eye-catching and functional. The specially designed twist and pour stopper lets you pour without having to remove the stopper completely. A simple twist is enough to allow liquids to flow out. This beverage bottle comes equipped with its own built-in, insulated stainless steel serving cup, so there is no need to pack an additional cup. The bottle also features a compact, fold-flat handle for easy carrying that also provides increased stability and handling when pouring. In order to maximize the incredible insulation technology, it is recommended to either pre-chill or pre-heat the beverage bottle just prior to use. This can be accomplished by filling the beverage bottle with cold or hot tap water, attaching the lid and letting it rest for a few minutes. Before you are ready to use, simply empty the water and fill with your favorite beverage. Attaching the lid will further increase the thermal efficiency. This bottle stays cool to the touch with hot beverages and condensation-free with cold beverages. The Stainless King Vacuum Insulated Beverage Bottle is made of BPA-free materials and is backed by a five-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Thermos vacuum insulation technology for maximum temperature retention, hot or cold; keeps liquids hot for 24 hours and cold for 24 hours
Durable stainless steel interior and exterior
Cool to the touch with hot liquids, sweat proof with cold
Insulated stainless steel serving cup; capacity 68 ounces/2 liter
Twist and pour stopper lets you pour without removing the stopper

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
